title: Got a Pentakill, while wearing the Pentakill Morde skin, and the opposing team surrendered after.
body:
This is also, I believe, my FIRST Pentakill in about four years of playing League.

...Good day. Today is a good day.

replies.body: Pentakill on Amumu?! Crying is OP.

Oh, no it was on Vayne.

Felt great till I remembered it was ARAM and people get them all the time.
Still nice, though. :D Vayne was my first Quadra, coincidentally.

Ooh, nice.

Still waiting on a penta with my main bae though. {{champion:40}}

Pull off a Janna Penta and they'll all be..

Blown Away.
There's a bad blowjob joke in there somewhere but I'm too tired to frame it properly.

I'm going to give it a shot:

**Pull off a Janna Penta and Janna will get you off.**

Am I trying too hard or am I getting somewhere?
Needs to be more subtle, as opposed to Janna's sense of fashion.
Not that that's a bad thing. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

got a penta on AP janna back in s1/s2

they gutted her too hard, ap janna is trash now a days.
oh well.

apparently pressing Q to clear a wave when spending 1/4 of your mana bar per Q was too overpowered
Kappa kappa..fuck support janna...

I share your bitterness of their gutting supports away from non-support roles. It's got to be the ONLY role in the god damn game where they're dead set on keeping them hedged in to one little tiny niche. Plus since they did that all the midlaners took over bot lane because, hey hey, they DO MORE DAMAGE.

RIP top lane on-hit Lulu.
I got 2 pentas with {{champion:55}}  in 2 weeks. Does it count?
Kat doesn't count for pentakills. Everyone knows that.

> [{quoted}](name=B1naryB0t,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7a9JHTVl,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2015-05-22T20:27:10.829+0000)
>
> Kat doesn't count for pentakills. Everyone knows that.

does ad kat count?

Ooh, it probably doe-
nope.
No kata for you.

> [{quoted}](name=EverTokki,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7a9JHTVl,comment-id=00000001000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-22T22:45:56.110+0000)
>
> Ooh, it probably doe-
> nope.
> No kata for you.

i literally played kat after i commented that and got a penta lol
http://www.carry.gg/superlatives/most-pentastic

> [{quoted}](name=B1naryB0t,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=7a9JHTVl,comment-id=0000000100010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-23T00:03:45.106+0000)
>
> http://www.carry.gg/superlatives/most-pentastic

fking amazing m8
Gotta be 5 in 5 weeks. Put the Penta in Pentakill. ;P

5 in 2 weeks*

Because we know 5 in 5 isn't challenging enough.

I recently picked up Katarina with the goal of finally getting a Pentakill! Because if I'm going to be honest with myself... I'm never going to get a Pentakill playing Soraka or Bard. I also tried Karthus but I couldn't cs with him at all (though I suppose it's something you get used to eventually?). :3
{{champion:11}} .
I wanna Lux penta one day....that's how i'll know i've made it.
Like that old Sivir quote: "Line them up, and knock them down!"
Congrats! My only ranked pentakill happened recently and it was with Rek'sai of all champions. With the Pentakill Morde skin though, that's amazing!
My first 3 were Yi so they didn't count

My first Pentakill was with {{champion:31}} that was an intense one....after i got the pentakill i brought every single Cho skin.....One of the most enjoyable one was with {{champion:4}} that game was pretty close....and the hardest i got recently was with {{champion:429}} God i love that champ...
Cho'Gath Penta... oh god so much CC, I can't even imagine.
Mordekasier es numero uno (huehuehue)

Yay!!!!

Congratulations buddy, you deserved the crap out of this one. This is a legit and respect worthy pentakill of sincere gameplay, not tainted by characters like omg lmao kills{{champion:105}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:222}} etc.

I am happy for you, party all day!!!!!

So my only penta, on Riven, still counts? 

pls.....

<3

Considering that the only champion that can kill Riven is Gromp (according to the video below), no.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iIfcBe_iI1I
I lol'd.
First Penta was in ARAM while playing {{champion:1}}. What a nice Darius giving me a penta at the end. <3
Congratz!
http://www.runjimborun.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/ryd2vn1yahptvfgt8lki.gif
thats cute.
I have no penta's but my best was a{{champion:31}} quad and baron steal..... Not really a steal as it was softened up by the other team and after killing them i just auto attacked it twice
congrats :) and to the quad guys i must be the god of quad cause i would get some games 3-4 in a row..{{champion:32}}  but no penta :((((((

Congrats. I don't think I've gotten a single penta yet, but I did get a bunch of quadras (literally every single quadra, there was one guy left and is killed by one of my teammates, sometimes even on purpose).
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0deA1JUUZFQ

I have four so far.

First one was on master yi, so personally I only kinda count that one. Forget how this one happened though.

Second one was on tryndamere. I wasn't particularly fed, but I walked out from behind the enemy team and cleaned up all of their carries right away. Then it was just a matter of chasing down the tank.

Third one was on yasuo. I also don't really count this one as I ended up in a mirror match against someone much less skilled than me so I just got really fed and murdered everything.

Fourth one was on Lucian. Got lucky on the last hits and just played the game well so this is probably the one I am most proud of.

My first penta was with my first time playing {{champion:84}} on free week... It felt like I had cheated. However, my first RANKED penta was with AP {{champion:96}}, and that felt completely earned! Final kill was bursting down a full-health Tristana while she was in the back of the fountain, in the final second before the inhib exploded! I wish so much that I had a replay of that moment...
My first penta was on {{champion:75}} . It was so boring. I last hit 4 people with my Q because I had no stacks, and then had a wet noodle fight to get the fifth.
148 games with ezreal in ranked 2 quadra kills 0 pentas 58.8 percent winrate. now i have 37 games as yasuo in ranked 35 percent winrate 5 quadras and 1 penta and im thinking wut
Yasuo can be basically a melee hypercarry if fed and snowballed. I've seen it happen, it's crazy.
mordekaiser is numero uno hue hue hue
